name: Japanese eng speaking course
description: This helpful app will help you to learn English and speak English more fluently. This app is especially designed for Japanese speaking people to learn english speaking very easily.  The program contains lessons that give special attention to English pronunciation and everyday language. With over 100 lessons based on a real world conversation. Each lesson contains multiple topic that you can click on to learn how to improve day by day. Presently a days without english it is extremely troublesome for us to get set in Mncs .So download this application for better understanding of how to talk in english. In this application you will effectively and fastly comprehend the fundamental term of enlgish and you will begin talking english smoothly. Download offline App and speak fluent English.
